metas.name: DAN DA DAN Season 2
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Comedy, Drama, Romance, Sci-Fi, Supernatural Tags:Ghost/Aliens/Youkai/Shounen/Primarily Teen Cast/Surreal Comedy/Heterosexual/Urban Fantasy/Female Protagonist/Artificial Intelligence/Cult/Kaiju/Tokusatsu/Male Protagonist/Henshin/Exorcism/Body Horror The second season of Dandadan.

Okarun and Jiji have made a strange discovery, while Momo finds herself under attack! What mysterious encounters await them next?!

(Source: Netflix Anime Twitter)

metas.name: Sono Bisque Doll wa Koi wo Suru Season 2
metas.description: Genres: Comedy, Ecchi, Romance, Slice of Life Tags:Cosplay/Otaku Culture/Gyaru/Seinen/Female Protagonist/Male Protagonist/Fashion/Heterosexual/Photography/Nudity The second season of Sono Bisque Doll wa Koi wo Suru.

metas.name: Kaiju No. 8 Season 2
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Sci-Fi Tags:Kaiju/Monster Boy/Shounen/Male Protagonist/Military/Urban Fantasy/Gore/Primarily Adult Cast/Shapeshifting/Guns/Super Power/Swordplay/Ojou-sama/Henshin/Tokusatsu/Work/Slapstick/Heterosexual/Tsundere The second season of Kaijuu 8-gou.

Kafka must face new challenges, new Kaiju, and… a new Captain?!

(Source: KAIJU NO. 8 EN Twitter)

metas.name: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Drama, Romance Tags:Primarily Teen Cast/Heterosexual/Shounen/School/Food/Urban/Male Protagonist/Female Protagonist/Iyashikei/Ensemble Cast/Delinquents Chidori High is a boys’ school that takes in the dregs of society with the lowest grades. Next door stands Kikyo Girls’ High, where the wealthy, high-class families send their precious daughters. Chidori second-year Rintaro, who has a fierce face but a gentle heart, is helping at his family’s patisserie when he meets a girl named Kaoruko. The two hit it off right away…but this blissful peace is quickly disturbed when Rintaro discovers that Kaoruko is actually a student at Kikyo. Worse, she doesn’t seem to realize what a huge problem this really is! Will these two be able to forge a path for themselves, and sidestep the traps (metaphorical and literal) laid by their classmates?

(Source: Kodansha USA)

metas.name: Gachiakuta
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Drama, Fantasy Tags:Shounen/Dystopian/Super Power/Post-Apocalyptic/Ensemble Cast/Male Protagonist/Urban Fantasy/Revenge/Survival A boy lives in a floating town, where the poor scrape by and the rich live a sumptuous life, simply casting their garbage off the side, into the abyss. When he’s falsely accused of murder, though, his wrongful conviction leads to an unimaginable punishment—exile off the edge, with the rest of the trash. Down on the surface, the cast-off waste of humanity has bred vicious monsters, and to travel the path to vengeance against those who cast him into Hell, a boy will have to become a warrior…

(Source: Kodansha USA)

metas.name: SAKAMOTO DAYS Part 2
metas.description: Genres: Action, Comedy Tags:Assassins/Shounen/Crime/Criminal Organization/Guns/Male Protagonist/Found Family/Konbini/Yakuza/Primarily Adult Cast/Super Power/Family Life/Gangs/Gore/Urban The second part of SAKAMOTO DAYS.

metas.name: Call of the Night Season 2
metas.description: Genres: Comedy, Psychological, Romance, Slice of Life, Supernatural Tags:Vampire/Urban Fantasy/Heterosexual/Hikikomori/Urban/Female Protagonist/Male Protagonist/Shounen/Coming of Age The second season of Yofukashi no Uta.

metas.name: The Rising of the Shield Hero Season 4
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy Tags:Anti-Hero/Medieval/Magic/Isekai/Male Protagonist/Dragons The fourth season of Tate no Yuusha no Nariagari.

The Return of the Exiled━

(Source: Official Twitter)

metas.name: Rascal Does Not Dream of Santa Claus
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Psychological, Romance, Supernatural Tags:College/Heterosexual/Urban Fantasy/Female Protagonist/Male Protagonist/Idol/Primarily Adult Cast/Acting Sequel to the film Seishun Buta Yarou wa Randoseru Girl no Yume wo Minai.

IS THE REAL MINISKIRT SANTA IN A SEA OF FAKES?

Sakuta thought he’d already accomplished step one: Find Touko Kirishima. The next step was convincing her to help protect Mai, but that proved easier said than done. In the process, however, he makes a confusing discovery: There are multiple Touko Kirishimas! The Touko he knows may not actually be the person he’s looking for! With clues from his friends’ prophetic dreams, he gets closer to figuring out exactly what danger awaits Mai, but he’ll have to sort through the fake Kirishimas and determine who’s the real deal before it’s too late…

(Source: Yen Press)

metas.name: The Summer Hikaru Died
metas.description:
Genres: Horror, Mystery, Psychological, Supernatural, Thriller Tags:Cosmic Horror/Rural/Male Protagonist/Monster Boy/Primarily Teen Cast/Unrequited Love/Seinen/LGBTQ+ Themes Two best friends living in a rural Japanese village: Yoshiki and Hikaru. Growing up together, they were inseparable… until the day Hikaru came back from the mountains, and was no longer himself. “Something” has taken over Hikaru’s body, memories, feelings… and everything they know begins to unravel.

(Source: Netflix)

metas.name: Dr.STONE SCIENCE FUTURE Part 2
metas.description: Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Sci-Fi Tags:Male Protagonist/Post-Apocalyptic/Foreign/Shounen The second cour of the fourth season of Dr.STONE.

metas.name: Grand Blue Season 2
metas.description: Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life, Sports Tags:College/School Club/Scuba Diving/Seinen/Male Protagonist/Nudity/Coastal/Slapstick/Surreal Comedy The second season of Grand Blue.

metas.name: New PANTY & STOCKING with GARTERBELT
metas.description: Genres: Action, Comedy, Ecchi, Supernatural Tags:Female Protagonist/Angels/Anti-Hero/Parody/Surreal Comedy/Demons/Swordplay/Guns The second season of Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt. Unveiled at Anime Expo 2022's "TRIGGER 10 YEAR ANNIVERSARY & ANNOUNCEMENT" panel.

metas.name: I Was Reincarnated as the 7th Prince So I Can Take My Time Perfecting My Magical Ability Season 2
metas.description: Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life Tags:Isekai/Magic/Medieval The second season of Tensei Shitara Dai Nana Ouji Dattanode, Kimamani Majutsu wo Kiwamemasu.

metas.name: Kanojo, Okarishimasu 4th Season
metas.description: Genres: Comedy, Romance Tags:Male Protagonist/Heterosexual/Female Harem/Fake Relationship/Female Protagonist/Shounen/Unrequited Love/Primarily Adult Cast/Urban The fourth season of Kanojo, Okarishimasu.

metas.name: Tougen Anki: Legend of the Cursed Blood
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Mystery, Supernatural Tags:Shounen/Male Protagonist/Demons/Guns/Urban Fantasy/Revenge/Shapeshifting/CGI The bloodlines of “Oni” and “Momotarou” have been passed down among certain humans for generations.

Long ago, the Oni, aware of their own ferocity, lived in seclusion. However, their peace was shattered by an invasion led by Momotarou. Over thousands of years, these two factions formed the “Momotarou Agency” and the “Oni Agency,” respectively, and have been locked in conflict ever since.

The protagonist, Shiki Ichinose, suddenly learns of his Oni lineage following an unexpected attack by Momotarou. This revelation sets Shiki on a path to discover the destiny that lies within his blood — a meeting with the Oni dwelling within him.

—A new generation of dark heroics begins here in this tale of demons!

(Source: Official Site)

metas.name: CITY THE ANIMATION
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life Tags:Slapstick/Seinen/Urban/Female Protagonist/Ensemble Cast This town, is not just a normal town.
There's laughter, love and emotional moments.
An unpredictable ordinary life presented by the residents.
Exciting stuffs come one after another. Welcome to CITY.

(Source: Kyoto Animation)

metas.name: Silent Witch: Chinmoku no Majo no Kakushigoto
metas.description:
Genres: Adventure, Fantasy Tags:Female Protagonist/Shoujo/Witch/Magic/Politics/School/Royal Affairs/Bullying/Dragons/Ojou-sama/Class Struggle Monica Everett, the Silent Witch, is the world’s only practitioner of Voiceless Magic, a veritable heroine who single-handedly fended off the Black Dragon of legend. However, the young prodigy is actually…super-duper shy! Yup, turns out she only learned Voiceless Magic to avoid speaking in public. Ignorant of this, the Seven Sages have placed her on a top-secret mission to guard the Second Prince. Can Monica keep it together as she contends with both social interaction and the evils targeting the young royal?

(Source: Yen Press, edited)

metas.name: There's No Freaking Way I'll Be Your Lover! Unless...
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Romance Tags:Female Protagonist/Primarily Female Cast/Yuri/Female Harem/LGBTQ+ Themes/School Renako Amaori is leaving her awkward and lonely junior high school life behind, determined to become a normal girl with normal friends in high school. Glamorous, confident Mai Ouzuka is Renako’s total opposite: wealthy, outgoing, and a literal fashion model. Against the odds, the two girls form an immediate connection. Renako thinks she may have found the best friend of her dreams…until Mai’s romantic confession sends her into a tailspin. Renako wants to prove to Mai that being BFFs is better than being girlfriends, but Mai is dead set on convincing Renako that they’re destined to be lovers. Let the love games begin!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

metas.name: Kakkou no Iinazuke Season 2
metas.description: Genres: Comedy, Romance Tags:School/Heterosexual/Male Protagonist/Arranged Marriage/Inseki/Shounen/Female Protagonist The second season of Kakkou no Iinazuke.

metas.name: Jidou Hanbaiki ni Umarekawatta Ore wa Meikyuu wo Samayou 2nd Season
metas.description: Genres: Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy Tags:Language Barrier/Isekai/Food/Magic/Dungeon/Parody/Male Protagonist/Economics/Martial Arts The second season of Jidou Hanbaiki ni Umarekawatta Ore wa Meikyuu wo Samayou.

metas.name: Tsuyokute New Saga
metas.description:
Genres: Adventure, Fantasy Tags:Female Harem/Male Protagonist/Demons/Dragons After a fierce battle, Magic swordsman Kyle finally killed the Demon Lord after being seriously injured in the battle. Kyle on the verge of death approaches a relic which was in possession of the Demon Lord and it sends him to the past. After recovering from the initial shock, he decides to use this opportunity to avoid making the same mistakes of the past and become stronger.

Note: Initially scheduled for July 2023, the anime saw several delays and a complete change in Director (previously Norikazu Ishigooka) and Studio (previously Yokohama Anime Lab x Makaria)

metas.name: Takopii no Genzai
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Psychological, Sci-Fi Tags:Denpa/Bullying/Shounen/Female Protagonist/Aliens Takopi travels from his home of Happy Planet to spread happiness across Earth, but meets the unsmiling Shizuka upon landing. Her friends at school and home life seem to be the source of her somber expression—and the pure-hearted Takopi is determined to change things for the better! But what truths await him when the curtains rise in this shocking drama?!

(Source: MANGA Plus)

metas.name: Mizu Zokusei no Mahou Tsukai
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy Tags:Isekai/Magic/Survival Ryou is delighted to be reincarnated into the fantastical world of Phi, where he thinks he’ll get to live a quiet life learning to use his newfound water magic. Going with the flow here, however, means something very different. Ryou is immediately pitted against the wild lands he winds up in and the slew of deadly monsters that call the remote subcontinent home. You’d think he’d forget about taking it easy when he’s stuck fighting for his life, but lucky for Ryou, he’s naturally optimistic, clever, and blessed with the hidden “Eternal Youth” trait. Twenty years pass in the blink of an eye, and each encounter along the way pushes him one step closer to the pinnacle of human magic. Little does he realize that’s only the opening chapter of his tale. A fateful meeting soon thrusts Ryou to the forefront of history, forever changing the course of his life... Thus begins the adventures of the strongest water magician the world has ever seen—who also likes to do things at his own pace!

(Source: J-Novel Club)

metas.name: Isekai Mokushiroku Mynoghra: Hametsu no Bunmei de Hajimeru Sekai Seifuku
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Romance Tags:Isekai Takuto Ira succumbed to illness at a young age and ended up reincarnating in a world that resembles the fantasy turn-based strategy game Eternal Nations. Not only did he reincarnate into his favorite game, but as the god who commands the evil civilization Mynoghra. With Mynoghra's beautiful hero unit, Sludge Witch Atou by his side, not even legendarily difficult race traits will stand in the way of restarting their civilization! “Lord Takuto…won't you start over with me?” Explore, Expand, Exploit, Exterminate! A tactical fantasy world is waiting for heroes like you! Join Eternal Nations today!

(Source: Cross Infinite World)

metas.name: Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun 2 Part 2
metas.description: Genres: Action, Comedy, Drama, Mystery, Supernatural Tags:Urban Fantasy/Youkai/Ghost/Female Protagonist Sequel to Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun 2.

metas.name: Arknights: RISE FROM EMBER
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Fantasy Tags:Pandemic/Dystopian/War/Kemonomimi/Ensemble Cast "She" was supposed to be a beacon of hope. But now her anger and hatred have turned into flames of war and are about to engulf the people.

Only Rhodes Island, a neutral organization, can stop Reunion's rampage and the conspiracy behind it. Amiya and the others head towards Chernobog's Core City, which is on a collision course with Lungmen. What fate awaits them there...

(Source: Official Site, translated, edited)

metas.name: Mikadono Sanshimai wa Angai, Choroi.
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Tags:Shounen/Heterosexual/School
Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!

metas.name: Solo Camping for Two
metas.description:
Genres: Slice of Life Tags:Camping/Seinen Gen Kinokura, 34 years old.

A solitary camper who cherishes his alone time in nature, Gen enjoys his usual solo camping trips. However, he unexpectedly encounters Shizuku Kusano, a complete beginner in camping. Reluctantly, Gen ends up camping with Shizuku, despite it being the last thing he wanted to do.

What will become of Gen’s peaceful camping life now that it’s turned upside down by this new companion?

(Source: Pony Canyon)

metas.name: Bad Girl
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy Tags:School/Female Protagonist/Primarily Female Cast/Cute Girls Doing Cute Things/Primarily Teen Cast/Delinquents/Yuri/LGBTQ+ Themes The story follows Yuu Yutani, a first-year high school student who is a good girl. However, to attract the attention of the school's disciplinary committee chairman and "madonna" Atori Mizutori, she begins to act like a delinquent.

(Source: Anime News Network)

metas.name: Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou Sareta Shiro Madoushi, S Rank Boukensha ni Hirowareru: Kono Shiro Madoushi ga Kikakugaisugiru
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy
Tags:Magic
One day, Lloyd, a white mage, is banished from the hero’s party. Lloyd, who has lost his job, happens to accompany an S-rank party on a quest by chance. At that time, no one knew that the hero’s party would collapse and Lloyd would gain fame - yet. This is the story of an extraordinary support magic-user who thinks he is normal, becomes an adventurer, while he is unaware how he eventually becomes peerless.

metas.name: Watari-kun no xx ga Houkai Sunzen
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Drama, Romance, Slice of Life Tags:Love Triangle/School/Female Harem/Kuudere/Yandere Naoto Watari has had his share of struggles: his parents died two years ago, and now he and his sister live at his aunt’s house. There, his desire to protect his sister earned him notoriety as “the guy with the sister complex”—which never mattered to him, as his sister always came first. But when Satsuki, a childhood friend-turned-enemy(?), becomes his school mate, Naoto’s ordinary life is thrown into chaos … and Satsuki may just be the beginning.

(Source: Kodansha USA)

metas.name: Dekin no Mogura: The Earthbound Mole
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural Tags:Seinen "I won't die 'cause I was banned from the afterlife."

A shady self-proclaimed hermit named Momoyuki Mogura, AKA: Mogura, is banned from the afterlife due to an incident. Now he collects spirit possessed will-o'-wisps in his lantern, hoping to make a comeback.

It seems that those who encounter him begin to see peculiar things.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

metas.name: Hell Teacher: Jigoku Sensei Nube (2025)
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Comedy, Horror, Supernatural Tags:Teacher/Shounen/Youkai/Demons/Exorcism/School/Primarily Child Cast A new anime project for Jigoku Sensei Nube.

The story follows Meisuke Nueno, aka "Nube," a psychic teacher with a demon hand, as he battles evil spirits and monsters to protect his students in this saga that employs elements of Japanese mythology and folklore to tell a fan-pleasing action story.

Known for its occult and horror elements on school ghost stories and urban legends, Nube captivated readers across generations with his heroic efforts to save his students from supernatural threats.

metas.name: Ame to Kimi to
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life Tags:Seinen/Female Protagonist/Animals If it looks like a dog and acts like a dog and insists it's a dog, it's...a dog? Probably? She adopted it anyway, and her life with this "dog" will never be boring!

(Source: Kodansha USA)

metas.name: GaCen Shoujo to Ibunka Kouryuu
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Romance Tags:Heterosexual/Otaku Culture/Video Games The story follows Renji Kusakabe, a young man who works part time at a game center arcade. One day, Renji encounters an English girl named Lily, and the two of them trade diaries and begin an unlikely friendship of cultural exchange...

(Source: Crunchyroll News)

metas.name: Zutaboro Reijou wa Ane no Moto Konyakusha ni Dekiai Sareru
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Romance Tags:Josei/Female Protagonist With unmaintained red hair and shabby clothes, Marie, the baron's daughter, has been treated like a servant all her life. Count Granado, the country's richest man, who is said to be a difficult misogynist, falls in love with her at first sight. However, due to a misunderstanding, Count Granado proposes to her sister Anastasia, who looks like a princess, instead of the ragged Marie. A very popular work from "Become a Novelist"! Marie's Cinderella story that began with a hero's misunderstanding!

(Source: Pocket Comics)

metas.name: Clevatess: Majuu no Ou to Akago to Kabane no Yuusha
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Drama, Fantasy Tags:Anti-Hero/Demons/Swordplay/Gore The story centers on the the titular Clevatess, the lord of all magical beasts, who wields both uncanny intellect and destructive power. Frustrated by the 13 heroes tasked to destroy him, he has decided to be rid of humanity once and for all. However, he has been charged with one nuisance: the care of a newborn human baby. Now the world stands upon the brink of Armageddon, with the obligation of raising one child holding it all back.

(Source: Anime News Network)

metas.name: Nyaight of the Living Cat
metas.description:
Genres: Horror Tags:Pandemic/Post-Apocalyptic In the near future, a unique disease has swept across the planet: a virus that transforms humans into cats! And the horde is expanding, since if these adorable kitties snuggle with a human, the human is transformed into yet another cat. A small group of cat-loving survivors is trying to escape the madness, but how can you defend yourself against a threat you just want to cuddle and pet?! This wild new take on a post-apocalyptic survival tale will make you roll over and purr with delight!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

metas.name: Mattaku Saikin no Tantei to Kitara
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Mystery Tags:Detective/Surreal Comedy/Seinen/Police/Crime/Ensemble Cast/Primarily Adult Cast/Urban Nagumo Keiichirou was a genius high-school detective. No case was complex enough for him. But what happens to genius detectives when they get older?

Now 35, with bad hips, running a failing detective agency with no cases to solve and struggling to pay the rent, he's at a dead end.

In comes a high school girl in his office who says she wants to work with him. With her help, will the out-of-touch, old-fashioned Nagumo get back the fire of his youth?

metas.name: Turkey!-Time to Strike-
metas.description:
Genres: Slice of Life, Sports Tags:Bowling/Female Protagonist/Cute Girls Doing Cute Things/Primarily Female Cast "Turkey" is a bowling term for scoring three consecutive strikes.

Mai, a second-year student and captain of the Ikkokukan High School Bowling Club, is a genius who can't seem to win a match. Whenever she scores a Turkey, she mysteriously follows it up with an unyielding split—the Snake Eyes.

One day, Rina, the club’s only first-year member, confronts her "You’re doing it on purpose, aren’t you?"

"You’re running away from winning. But I want to win. If you have no intention of winning, I’ll quit."

(Source: Official Site)

metas.name: BULLET/BULLET
metas.description:
Genres: 
Tags:
A team of thieves find themselves in a world of trouble after completing their latest job.

metas.name: Koujo Denka no Katei Kyoushi
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Fantasy, Romance Tags:Magic/Female Harem/Male Protagonist After failing the final exam for his dream job at the royal court, promising young sorcerer Allen wants nothing more than to retreat to a simple life in the countryside. Unfortunately for him, he can’t even afford the train fare! His only solution is to get a job, but his one lead is anything but modest—Duke Howard, one of the kingdom’s most powerful nobles, needs a private tutor for his daughter Tina. Despite her academic brilliance, Tina is incapable of casting even a single spell. To make matters worse, entrance exams for the prestigious Royal Academy are fast approaching, and magical aptitude is mandatory! Can Allen use his unique brand of spellcasting to help Tina overcome her magical impairment, a mystery that not even the kingdom’s finest sorcerers have been able to solve? And does her father, the duke, even want him to?

(Source: J-Novel Club)

metas.name: Tsuihousha Shokudou e Youkoso!
metas.description:
Genres: Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life Tags:Food/Restaurant Dennis is one of the most popular members of the Silverwing Battalion, the world's strongest party. So popular, in fact, that the party leader expels him from the group out of spite.

Stripped of his home, Dennis decides to start life anew following his true calling—as a chef! His life as an adventurer might be over, but his new life as a cook is just beginning. He teams up with Atelier, a young girl who has been similarly exiled from her home, and opens up a restaurant for adventurers.

He's finally able to live out his dream, but he'll need use of more than just his cooking skills to take care of his eclectic customers' problems!

(Source: Kaiten Books)

metas.name: Food Court de, Mata Ashita.
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life Tags:Female Protagonist/Cute Girls Doing Cute Things/Gyaru To their classmates, Wada is a quiet rich girl while Yamamoto is an intimidating lone wolf…but what they don’t know is that Wada is a mobile game addict in a passionate love-hate relationship (with a 2D character) and Yamamoto has a penchant for urban legends with eyes only for her favorite YouTuber. And their biggest not-so-secret secret—these unlikely friends meet at the food court every day after school to rant, rave, and learn what makes each other tick!

(Source: Yen Press)

metas.name: Pokémon Concierge Part 2
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy, Slice of Life Tags:Female Protagonist/Animals/Work/Iyashikei Continuation of Pokémon Concierge.

This September, the adorable stop-motion animation series Pokémon Concierge returns with four new episodes, inviting viewers back to the Pokémon Resort — a vibrant haven where Pokémon come to relax and enjoy. The story follows Haru, a concierge at the Pokémon Resort, as she grows through her interactions with Pokémon guests and learns valuable life lessons along the way.

(Source: Netflix)

metas.name: Hotel Inhumans
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Drama Tags:Inn/Assassins The most exquisite hotels in the world have certain standards: the finest food, the most sublime comfort, captivating entertainment, the latest weapons, reliable identity fabrication, and untraceable corpse disposal.

The name of this place where the people who have “forgotten their humanity” visit is “Hotel Inhumans.” The hitmen guests are welcomed by the concierges who never say "no."

metas.name: Kizetsu Yuusha to Ansatsu Hime
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Comedy, Fantasy Tags:Female Harem Hero Toto possesses great skills, but his extreme shyness has left him unable to form a party, causing him to remain stuck in the town where his journey began.

One day, he is suddenly invited to join a party by three beautiful women—Ciel, Anemone, and Gore. Overjoyed at finally setting off on an adventure, Toto is filled with excitement... but little does he know, these women are dead set on killing him!

A deathly harem romcom unfolds as the socially anxious hero, who faints from mere flustered excitement around women, finds himself the target of three deadly companions, each with their own reasons for wanting him gone!

metas.name: 9-nine- Shihaisha no Oukan
metas.description:
Genres: Mystery, Supernatural Tags:Male Protagonist/Female Harem 9-nine- is a tale of the town of Shiromitsugawa, host to mysterious Artifacts and the superpowers they bestow on their Users. A tale of growing trust and budding romance between the protagonist and the heroine, and also a murder mystery where they hunt down the culprit behind a series of supernatural murders.

(Source: Steam Description)

metas.name: KAMITSUBAKI CITY UNDER CONSTRUCTION
metas.description:
Genres: Mystery, Supernatural Tags: Seven years after humanity was devastated by a major disaster, a beacon of science and prosperity rises in Kamitsubaki City. But lurking in its shadows are Tesseractor, monsters born from human darkness. Only the Witchling, five girls with voices that wield magic, stand against them. With every note, they fight, not just to protect the peace of the city, but to heal a broken world.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: Announced in the "Kamitsubaki Yoyogi Kessen 2024: V.W.P 2nd ONE-MAN LIVE - Genshou II" Day 1 concert.
